name: Project.99_1703
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 2 games.

[Between] by Jaehyun Yoo

Find a bomb position by measuring distance using keyboard's alphabetic keys (q,w,e,r,t,y,u,i,o,p,a,s,d,f,g,h,j,k,l,z,x,c,v,b,n,m).

[Dice Dungeon] by Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang

Roll a dice. Explore a dungeon. Find a treasure. Good luck.
